title: Ticket #3385: Add BOINC as a grid universe-supported service
description:
We want to support BOINC as a service that Condor can submit jobs to. This would appear as a new service type under the grid universe.

See design document for details.

Milestones

  • Outline interaction between HTCondor and BOINC (DONE)
  • [2 days effort] Complete details of BOINC GAHP protocol (DONE)
  • [? days effort] Implement BOINC GAHP (DONE)
  • [7 days effort] Add BOINC code to gridmanager (DONE)
  • Add BOINC code as an external (Jaime Frey)
  • [5 days effort] Integration testing (Jaime Frey and Dave Anderson)
  • [3 days effort] Write automated regression tests (Jaime Frey)
